H0.text: 100% tall is the phenotype of a cross between a homozygous dominant tall plant and a homozygous recessive short plant.

H1.text: 100% short plants are the phenotype of a cross between a homozygous dominant tall plant and a homozygous recessive short plant.

H2.text: 25% short, 75% tall is the phenotype of a cross between a homozygous dominant tall plant and a homozygous recessive short plant.

H3.text: 50% short, 50% tall plants are the phenotype of a cross between a homozygous dominant tall plant and a homozygous recessive short plant.

A4.text: All the peas produced in the second or hybrid generation were round.

A5.text: All the peas of this F1 generation have an Rr genotype.
